title.rendered: Budget Hearing & Board of Education Meeting on May 9

content.rendered:
The Board of Education will hold a budget hearing and regular meeting on May 9.  The meeting will be held at the Saratoga Springs High School Teaching Auditorium. Watch the meeting through youtube.

  • Budget Hearing  at 6:30 p.m.
  • Regular Meeting at 7:00 p.m.

Meeting agendas and minutes are posted through BoardDocs.
